ttl_cleanup_description: Clean up expired sessions and checklists based on user tier TTL policies. This operation cannot be undone.
admin_cleanup_warning: This will clean up expired sessions for ALL user tiers. This action cannot be undone and may affect multiple users.
orphaned_cleanup_warning: This will clean up orphaned documents that are no longer referenced by their parent documents. This action cannot be undone.
view_system_statistics: View system-wide statistics and usage data
manage_data_retention: Manage data retention and cleanup policies
manage_user_accounts: Manage user accounts and admin roles
cleanup_expired_data: Clean up expired data across all tiers
system_analytics_coming_soon: System analytics feature coming soon. This will provide detailed insights into system usage, user behavior, and performance metrics.
user_management_coming_soon: User management feature coming soon. This will allow you to view all users, manage admin roles, and perform user administration tasks.
system_settings_coming_soon: System settings feature coming soon. This will allow you to configure system-wide policies, feature flags, and administrative settings.
data_cleanup_coming_soon: Data cleanup feature coming soon. This will allow you to perform system-wide data cleanup operations across all user tiers.
upgrade_to_create_more: You've reached your current plan's limit. Upgrade to create more checklists and items.
faq_create_checklist_question: How do I create a checklist?
faq_create_checklist_answer: Tap the "+" button on the home screen, enter a title and description, then add items to your checklist.
faq_start_session_question: How do I start a session?
faq_start_session_answer: Tap on any checklist from the home screen, then tap "Start Session" to begin working through your items.
faq_complete_items_answer: During a session, swipe left on an item to mark it as complete, or tap the checkbox next to it.
faq_skip_items_answer: During a session, swipe right on an item to skip it for now. You can always come back to it later.
faq_achievements_answer: Achievements are rewards you earn for using the app regularly. Check your profile to see your progress!
faq_change_language_question: How do I change the language?
faq_change_language_answer: Go to Settings > Language and select your preferred language from the available options.
faq_enable_notifications_answer: Go to Settings > Notifications and toggle the notification types you want to receive.
faq_offline_use_question: Can I use the app offline?
faq_offline_use_answer: Yes! The app works offline and will sync your data when you're back online.
faq_multiple_views_question: What are the different view types for checklists?
faq_multiple_views_answer: Checklister offers three view types: Swipe View (one item at a time), List View (scrollable list with checkboxes), and Matrix View (grid layout). Tap the menu (⋮) in the top-right corner of any checklist to switch between views.
faq_switch_views_question: How do I switch between different view types?
faq_switch_views_answer: Open any checklist, then tap the hamburger menu (⋮) in the top-right corner of the screen. Select your preferred view type from the options. Each checklist remembers your preferred view.
faq_list_view_question: What is List View and how do I use it?
faq_list_view_answer: List View shows all your checklist items in a scrollable list. You can check off items directly, edit them by tapping the menu (⋮) next to each item, or reorder items using the move up/down options. Perfect for quick overview and editing.
faq_swipe_view_question: What is Swipe View and when should I use it?
faq_swipe_view_answer: Swipe View shows one item at a time, perfect for focused work sessions. Swipe left to complete items, right to skip them. This view is ideal when you want to concentrate on one task at a time.
